Build 20031126 + latest JDT Core

1. Create the following class:
public class X {
	X(Object arg) {
	}
	void foo() {
		new X("") {
			void bar() {
				new Object() {
					void selectMe() {
					}
				};
			}
		};
	}
}
2. Select 'selectMe()' and press F3
